text: Shivraj Singh Chouhan (born 5 March 1959) is an Indian politician and member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is the 17th and current Chief Minister of Madhya Pradesh state in India. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Indian Hindus Category:Politicians from Madhya Pradesh Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Shivraj Singh Chouhan
